home.title: Connectivity
home.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to regenerate the APIKey?

requestHelp.greeting: Hi, how can we help you?
requestHelp.instruction: Select how you would like to receive help from our Customer Representatives

helpTicket.title: Submit A Help Ticket
helpTicket.description: We will respond as soon as possible

description.descriptionOne: Add your medications and set your dose schedule.
description.descriptionTwo: Get automatic reminders and track your treatment progress.
description.descriptionThree: See how long until the next dose and what’s already completed.
description.descriptionFour: All in one place, simple and easy to use.

gridPro.title: Personalized treatment tracking
gridPro.descriptionOne: Choose the medicine you're taking and define how often and how long you want to take it.
gridPro.descriptionTwo: In just a few clicks, create a personalized schedule for each medication.
gridPro.descriptionThree: Ideal for both long-term and short-term treatments.

fxMarket.title: Real-time treatment insights
fxMarket.descriptionOne: After adding your medications, monitor how long until your next dose.
fxMarket.descriptionTwo: See what percentage of your treatment has already been completed.
fxMarket.descriptionThree: Get visual reminders and stay committed to your health routine.
fxMarket.descriptionFour: More autonomy for you or your caregiver.
fxMarket.descriptionFive: Also great for family caregivers and healthcare professionals.

algorithmic.title: Modern, safe and reliable
algorithmic.descriptionOne: Forget sticky notes or confusing alarms:
algorithmic.descriptionTwo: our platform keeps everything organized in one place.
algorithmic.descriptionThree: Designed with an intuitive, responsive layout that adapts to your day-to-day.
algorithmic.descriptionFive: your health deserves the best of technology.

description.descriptionOne: This is a secure Tech Pharmacy authentication service
description.descriptionTwo: that allows you access to Tech Pharmacy services

notFound.title: 404 Page not found
notFound.descriptionOne: I'm afraid you've found a page that doesn't exist on Tech Pharmacy.
notFound.descriptionTwo: That can happen when you follow a link to something that has since been deleted.
notFound.descriptionThree: Or the link was incorrect to begin with.
